meanings.definition: The act of firing a gun or other weapon.
meanings.sent1: The police investigated the shootings in the city.
meanings.sent2: The sound of shootings echoed through the forest.
meanings.sent3: The cowboy's shootings were so loud, they scared the horses!
meanings.sent4: Her sharp eyes caught every detail of the shootings in the distance.
meanings.sent5: The movie director choreographed the shootings with precision.

meanings.definition: The act of filming a movie or taking photographs.
meanings.sent1: The shootings for the action scene took place in the desert.
meanings.sent2: The film crew set up the shootings in the old mansion.
meanings.sent3: The photographer's shootings captured the beauty of the sunset.
meanings.sent4: Her camera lens focused on the shootings of the bustling city.
meanings.sent5: The shootings of the wildlife documentary were breathtaking.

meanings.definition: The act of projecting or propelling something forward quickly.
meanings.sent1: The sudden shootings of water from the fountain surprised the children.
meanings.sent2: The forceful shootings of the rocket propelled it into space.
meanings.sent3: The chef's shootings of flour created a cloud in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: The strong wind caused the shootings of leaves to swirl around.
meanings.sent5: The powerful shootings of the athlete broke the world record.
